overview: When guys accept the Invitation Only-offer to visit Johan Volny's house in downtown Prague, you can sure as fuck guarantee that they don't go with the intention of passing the occasion in polite conversation. Mouths (and asses for that matter) are put to much better use, as thick, uncut cocks and ripe, heavy balls serve as the order of the day. Invitation Only is a definite must-see for all fans of Johan Volny and his uber-sexy Czech friends!
tagline: 16 great scenes! Over 2 hours of action!
title: Invitation Only
